episode_summary: This episode covers a range of fascinating topics including the rental of bees for pollination, the importation of ice to Iceland, the invasive quagga mussel in Britain, and the historical perception of the color blue by humans.

facts.fact: For just one penny you can rent a bee for a month.
The most dangerous invasive species in Britain is a poo-eating mussel from Transylvania.
Until about 4,000 years ago, humans didn't notice the colour blue.
